description: http://anidb.net/ch8676 [Kurata Sana] is a frenetic eleven-year-old child actress with an extremely overprotective agent, a mother who is an eccentric award-winning author, and a burning desire to do well in school. However, as much as she wants to be a good student, the antics of the boys in her class make learning impossible, according to Sana anyway. And in her eyes, http://anidb.net/ch29809 [Hayama Akito] is the worst offender of them all. A junior-high war of the sexes ensues, and Sana eventually realizes through the chaos that Hayama may not be the devil boy she`s made him up to be.

REGULAR.description: While Principal Naru Naru is away, Andou-sensei decides Sana`s class must pass a test in order to move on to junior high. This spells trouble for Sana, who`s never gotten along with math (and for Hayama, who seems to be getting back to his old ways).

titles.title: Math Mess

REGULAR.description: Sana (repeatedly) tries to help Mami-chan and Hayama heal old wounds.
